titleStmt.title: Dominus est Deus, Gloria æterna Domini nostri Jesu Christi vindicata, contra egregiam errorum farraginem quæ inferibitur catechesis Ecclesiarum Polonicarum
titleStmt.author: Elys, Edmund, ca. 1634-ca. 1707.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edmund Elys. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Place of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
